main event: Multiple civilians observed an unidentified flying object over Oak Ridge, Tennessee on 5 December 1950.
interesting points: The object was described as a brilliant metallic light that appeared round and flat before changing to a dark gray color., It was observed by at least two confirmed witnesses, including a secretary and another civilian., The sighting lasted for approximately 60 seconds and occurred between 12:45 and 1:00 PM., The object flew slowly at an altitude of about 500 feet and changed direction from east to northwest., There was no sound associated with the object, and it left no definite trail.
sighted object: a brilliant metallic, round, flat object
witness description: civilians including a secretary and another citizen
